profile: University of Chicago, Class of 2018 (LOA 2014-2015) (triple major in Economics, Computer Science, and Mathematics). National Merit Scholar. Inducted into Signifer, the Scarsdale, NY Senior High School academic honor society, and Tri-M, national music honor society. Developer with significant Ruby/Rails and Objective-C/Cocoa/Cocoa Touch experience. Code used on several million devices daily, and by hundreds of thousands of developers.

work.name: Tumblr
accomplishments: Worked with a small team to build a top-tier iOS app
Navigated a large and complex codebase, refactoring everything in my path
Built several user-facing features, from planning to design to execution and testing
Collaborated closely with the Creative team to ensure a top-notch user experience

work.name: Slader
accomplishments: Took over codebase from foreign contractor
Added ads and in-app-purchases to increase profit from mobile users
Customized mobile experience, increasing customer satisfaction
Released two new major versions with over 75,000 monthly active users

work.name: Codecademy
accomplishments: Prototyped new entries into the mobile space
Led a beta test of a new product category
Explored moving existing products onto mobile platforms
